column1: Uchi////Dined here three days ago on a Friday night with my girlfriend. I hate brussels Â sprouts
column2: but the way they make them here
column4: keep popping them in ma mouth like eating popcorn. Ordered two machi cure and two walu walu
column5: these are our favorite items. The foie nigiri is very good
column6: but $9.50 is pricey just for one piece. The zero sen and ham & eggs rolls were great. My girlfriend had a glass of moscato
column7: it went very well with the meal
